## utils.dom.addClass() function

Add a CSS class to a element. Similar to Closure's goog.dom.classes.add, except it handles SVG elements.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function addClass(element: Element, className: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | Element | DOM element to add class to. |
|  className | string | Name of class to add.  True if class was added, false if already present.  Blockly.utils.dom.addClass |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
